GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a singular article based on article_id

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: returns an arary of all comments for an article by newest created

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Allows an existing user to post a comment to a valid article_id and returns it. The date is automatically filled and generated as is comment_id and votes set to 0
